title: "GetSnapshot"
title_tag: "Function GetSnapshot | Module ebs | Package AWS"

---



<!-- WARNING: this file was generated by Pulumi Docs Generator. -->
<!-- Do not edit by hand unless you're certain you know what you are doing! -->

Use this data source to get information about an EBS Snapshot for use when provisioning EBS Volumes

{{% examples %}}
## Example Usage
{{% example %}}

```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as aws from "@pulumi/aws";

const ebsVolume = pulumi.output(aws.ebs.getSnapshot({
    filters: [
        {
            name: "volume-size",
            values: ["40"],
        },
        {
            name: "tag:Name",
            values: ["Example"],
        },
    ],
    mostRecent: true,
    owners: ["self"],
}, { async: true }));
```

{{% /example %}}
{{% /examples %}}

## GetSnapshot Result {#result}

The following output properties are available:





<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>Data<wbr>Encryption<wbr>Key<wbr>Id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The data encryption key identifier for the snapshot.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>Description</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>

</dd>

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>Encrypted</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>

    </dt>
    <dd>Whether the snapshot is encrypted.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>Id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>

    </dt>
    <dd>id is the provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>Kms<wbr>Key<wbr>Id</span>

    </dt>
    <dd>The ARN for the KMS encryption key.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>Owner<wbr>Alias</span>

    </dt>
    <dd>Value from an Amazon-maintained list (`amazon`, `aws-marketplace`, `microsoft`) of snapshot owners.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>Owner<wbr>Id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The AWS account ID of the EBS snapshot owner.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">

</dd>

            title="">
        <span>encrypted</span>

            title="">

</dd>

            title="">

</dd>

            title="">

</dd>
